description: Try our easy to follow Hot Cross Bun Trifle with Raspberry Jelly & Peaches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hot Cross Bun Trifle with Raspberry Jelly & Peaches Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300ml thickened cream, whipped to soft peaks
2 cup peach slices in natural juice

recipeInstructions.text: Tear the hot cross buns into pieces, then arrange one-third in the bottom of a 11/2L dish, reserving the rest. Chop the jelly into pieces and place one-third on top, then one-third of the peaches and their juice, finishing with one-third of the whipped cream. Repeat with the remaining hot cross buns, jelly, peaches and cream.
Scatter the meringue and strawberry sauce on top of the trifle, then serve.
